item.description:
Earth Day is the perfect time for us to discuss our plans for gardening!

What kind of a layout do you plan?

Have you considered extending your growing season by using a shelter of some kind?

How about a $19.99 portable net greenhouse that extends to 10 ft long?

How about a passive solar earth-sheltered greenhouse?

Your group organizer will bring material describing these, but other members are requested to bring additional information to share.

ATTENTION EXPERIENCED GARDENERS: We need you to share your expertise!

group.name: Back to Basics: Sustainable Self-Sufficient Healthy Living

item.name: Earth Day Meeting: Gardening Plans and Strategies
